page.title: Conwood
page.description: Distributor of waterproofing, concrete repair, gypsum and sealant materials such as Bostik, Knauf, Yoshino, Boral, Fibrin, Gripset, Shinetsu & Star Series

subtitle: Beautiful Like Real Wood
content: Conwood innovatively combines the beauty and ease of real woodworking with the strength and durability of concrete. With a strong commitment to preserving Indonesia's rainforests, Conwood provides innovative wood replacement solutions.

subsection1.title: Conwood Eave 2 in 1
subsection1.content: Conwood Eave looks like teak wood, and gives your roof a natural, textured wood look and eliminates the worry of termites on your roof. This product is easy to install, and very durable.

subsection2.title: Conwood Ceiling Border
subsection2.content: Give your ceiling a beautiful new decorative look with Conwood Ceiling Border. This durable product is perfect for covering all joints between walls and ceilings, and can perfectly decorate your ceiling without any visible gaps.

subsection3.title: Conwood Lath
subsection3.content: Decorate the ceiling and walls of your home with Conwood Lath which is easy to install, Conwood Lath is perfect for interior design work and can also be used to give a beautiful Conwood feel to the exterior of your building.

subsection1.title: Conwood Lap Siding G-Series
subsection1.content: Conwood Lap Siding G-Series has its beauty in modern design. Available in multiple series with grooves and grooves on the edges for fast and convenient installation, delivering a smooth and strong finish.

subsection2.title: Conwood Lap Siding BG
subsection2.content: Rediscover the classic look of your home with Conwood Lap Siding BG which has a natural wood texture that is beautifully designed to give a modern and classic look to various types of buildings. This product is easy to install and is a very good choice to decorate walls.

subsection3.title: Conwood Decorative Panel 1" Stick
subsection3.content: Conwood Decorative Panel 1” Stick is an innovative wood substitute that has been developed to be a decorative solution for both interior and exterior wall design purposes. This sturdy and easy-to-install product is an excellent alternative to real wood

subsection4.title: Conwood Decorative Panel ECP (Exposure Concrete Panel)
subsection4.content: Beautiful, lightweight and easy to install. Has the appearance of a cement wall. Strong & resistant to all weather conditions. Can be applied to interior & exterior as well as for decorative purposes

subsection5.title: Conwood Decorative Panel Array
subsection5.content: A harmonious new line in design. Unique and long-lasting beauty. Can be applied to both interior and exterior

subsection6.title: Conwood Decorative Panel Rhythm
subsection6.content: Perfect blend in line and surface thickness. Unique and incredibly attractive design. Can be applied to interior & exterior

subsection7.title: Conwood Mound
subsection7.content: Cover the gaps between the walls and the floor of your home with Conwood Mold, an elegant solution that prevents dirt from sticking to the bottom of your walls. This product adds a beautiful decorative feel to your home while effectively covering the joints between the floor and walls.

subsection1.title: Conwood Decorative Decks
subsection1.content: Install Conwood Decorative Deck on concrete to give an elegant wood flooring look to any interior or exterior space. This beautiful and easy-to-install product is a powerful and durable solution that helps high humidity areas stay free from insect attack and weathering.

subsection2.title: Conwood Deck 12”
subsection2.content: Install the strong and durable Conwood Deck to give a real wood flooring look to any space. Quick and easy installation, this eco-friendly solution is perfect for interior and exterior décor.

subsection3.title: Conwood Decorative Stair
subsection3.content: Conwood Decorative Stair is a beautiful and affordable replacement for your wooden staircase. It gives a clean and modern look to any home. Plus, it is extremely strong and scratch resistant against friction and termites.

subsection1.title: Conwood Sunshade
subsection1.content: Conwood Sunshade is a great way to cover and protect your home from the sun. The natural grooved pattern of this Conwood product gives your home an elegant and modern look.

subsection2.title: Conwood Plank 2”
subsection2.content: Conwood Plank 2” is a multi-purpose product that can be used for a variety of purposes, and gives a classic, modern look to any space. This durable product can be used creatively to create a decorative wood feel in homes and other buildings.

subsection3.title: Conwood Fence
subsection3.content: Protect your home with Conwood Fence, a strong and sturdy product that requires far less maintenance than real wood. This easy-to-install fence provides security for your property as well as giving your home an elegant and natural look.
